subject: Closure
description: Conditional branch is moved outside the scope of the variable it is conditioned on by fold constants optimization.

subject: Nashorn

description: When computing the TypeBounds for an AND expression, an undefined type produces a java.lang.AssertionError.

description: An attempted load of uninitialized bytecode slot produces a java.lang.AssertionError.

subject: Nashorn
issue: Since Nashorn is deprecated, an official issue was not created for this defect.
description: java.lang.AssertionError is thrown when MethodEmitter#load calls Symbol#getSlot on a Symbol for which Symbol#isSlotted returns false. Issue manifests for nested try-catch statements.
